title: Mandatory Reconsideration Notice (MRN)
question: Have you got a Mandatory Reconsideration Notice (MRN)?
subtitle: This is the letter DWP sent you if you asked them to reconsider their decision about the {{benefitType}}{{benefitEndText}}.
titleHeadIba: Have you got a Review Decision Notice
questionIba: Have you got a Review Decision Notice?
subtitleIba: This is the letter IBCA sent you if you asked them to reconsider their decision about the Infected Blood Compensation.

uc.subtitle_para2: Find your MRN in your Universal Credit online journal (opens in a new window).

haveAMRN.yes: Yes, I have a Mandatory Reconsideration Notice (MRN)
haveAMRN.no: No, I don’t have a Mandatory Reconsideration Notice (MRN)
haveAMRN.yesIba: Yes, I have a Review Decision Notice
haveAMRN.noIba: No, I don’t have a Review Decision Notice

error.required: You need to say whether you have an MRN. Select either yes or no.
error.requiredIba: You need to say whether you have a Review Decision Notice. Select either yes or no.
